content:
hange Data Capture Operation * Unique Key: A composite key, combining `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.TLC`, `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.BEGIN_DATE`, `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.BEGIN_TIME`, `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO` and `XCREW.ITEM_DAILY.UNO` fields. * Insert and update operations are carried out using Unique Key. * No delete operation is performed; instead, `status`(see Mapping for details) is updated based on the retrieved data. ### Mapping |Model Attribute|Source Table|Source Field|Detail| |:----|:----|:----|:----| |extraInfo| | | | |rosterId| | |Data Handling Operation| |tripId|`XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`|`CHAIN_DAILY_UNO`|when `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO` = “0“
then null else `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO`| |dutyId|`XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`|`CHAIN_DAILY_UNO`|when `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO` = “0“
then null else `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.CHAIN_DAILY_UNO`| |legId|`XCREW.ITEM_DAILY`|`EXTERNAL_ID`| | |flightId| | |N/A in the source system.| |crewId|`XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`|`TLC`| | |position|`XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY d`, `XCREW.RANK r`|`d.ASSIGNED_RANK`, `r.RANK`, `r.LONG_NAME_FCT`|when `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.ASSIGNED_RANK` = `XCREW.RANK.RANK`
then `XCREW.RANK.LONG_NAME_FCT`| |status|`XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY`|`DMLTYPE$$`, `OLD_NEW$$`|when `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.DMLTYPE$$` = “D“ or
(`XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.DMLTYPE$$` = “U“ and `XCREW.MLOG$_DUTY.OLD_NEW$$` = “U“)
then “CANCELLED“ else “ACTIVE“| |cumulativeSectors| | |N/A in the source system.| |sectorsInPhase| | |N/A in the source system.| |requiredSectorsInPhase| | |N/A in the source system.| |trainingPosition| | |N/A in the source system.| |trainingCode| | |N/A in the source system.| # Crew Ground Activity Data Model ### Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Scope **Tracking Duty:** :paperclip: Duty MLOG Data Retrieval **Tracking Duty Item:** :paperclip: Duty Item MLOG Data Retrieval #### - Source Query **Tracking Duty:** :paperclip: Duty MLOG Data Retrieval **Tracking Duty Item:** :paperclip: Duty Item MLOG Data Retrieval #### - Data Retrieval Trigger & Steps **Trigge
